This library extends the performance of Miller S. Puckette's 
realtime-computermusic-environment puredata (pd).

iem_vanilla contains 66 abstractions and their help files.

iem_vanilla is published under the Gnu Lesser General Public License 
that is included (GnuLGPL.txt).

Copyright (C) 2000-2020 Thomas MUSIL [musil_at_iem.at]

IEM - Institute of Electronic Music and Acoustics, Graz
Inffeldgasse 10/3, 8010 Graz, Austria
http://iem.at

    modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public
    License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either
    version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of

      (e.g.  http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

    License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software
    Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA  02111-1307  USA

            Thomas Musil
